Text.0: The stone walls around you are damp, lit sporadically by flickering torches. You hear the faint drip of water as you cautiously navigate the narrow corridor.

Text.4: Soft whispers float through the air, barely audible but compelling enough to guide you deeper into the dim, shadow-laden hallway.
